manytestsr 0.0.3.0000
  • Reference

A package to do many tests to localize causal effects in (sets of) experimental blocks

Development Info 

devtools::document()
devtools::check()

Notes:

We are using three main C functions: fast_dists_by_unit_arma2_par if we are using openmp (parallel="yes"), fast_dists_and_trans for small n, and fast_dists_and_trans_by_unit_arma for N>20. (Where 20 is chosen without a lot of profiling. Basic idea is not to hold large matrices in memory. Matrices are faster when N is not to large, but bog down when we have large number of observations.
